Vula is available for testing

Check out the source code and install it to experiment with Vula!

Vula welcomes contributions

To get involved in improving the Vula codebase we have some helpful tips, as well as a status document for the current implementation. If you are not sure where to get started the Vula TODO has tasks of various skill levels.

Vula is available for peer review

Our preprint publication about Vula is available for review. We additionally encourage reading about Vula's threat model and other technical details, a preliminary comparison with other similar systems, and a note about the history behind the name.
